inclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 18 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Documentation of HIV-1 infection by licensed ELISA test and confirmed by a Western Blot.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Documentation of hepatitis C infection by demonstration of a positive test for hepatitis C antibody and HCV RNA level of 2000 copies/mL or greater.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Histopathologic features consistent with chronic hepatitis C at the time of enrollment. A liver biopsy done for a subject within 24 months prior to his or her participation may be used as the baseline biopsy.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients with CD4+ cell counts greater than 100 cells/mm(3).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to sign the Informed Consent document, and willingness to comply with the study requirements and clinic policies.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ALT less than 7 times the NIH upper limit of normal.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum lipase less than 1.5 times the NIH upper limit of normal.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient cannot be on other experimental therapies (including expanded access/compassionate use of antiretrovirals) during his/her participation in this protocol.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients cannot have used interferon or peginterferon previously for the treatment of hepatitis C.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Mixed genotypes (e.g., 1/2, 1/4). Mixed genotype 1a/1b will be enrolled.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 53-year-old man with chronic HCV infection. He has been on IFN and RBV combination therapy for the past 9 months, with direct antiviral drugs added 6 months ago.
